    • Method Detail

      • getAllowedDays

        public int getAllowedDays()
        Returns:
        a bit map of the days the this profile is valid.

        Note : bitmap 0 = no days, 1 = Sun, 2 = Mon, 3 = Sun and Mon etc

      • getMaxStackSize

        public int getMaxStackSize()
        Returns:
        The maximum number of stacked transactions allowed.

        Only valid if isStackingAllowed() is true.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        the Profile name

      • getStartTime

        public int getStartTime()
        Returns:
        the start time for this profile, in minutes passed midnight

      • isAttendantAllowed

        public boolean isAttendantAllowed()
        Returns:
        a boolean value indicating whether attendants are allowed.

      • isAutoAuthorise

        public boolean isAutoAuthorise()
        Returns:
        a boolean value indicating whether automatic authorisation is currently active.

      • isAutoFallbackAllowed

        public boolean isAutoFallbackAllowed()
        Returns:
        If automatic switching into fallback mode is allowed when the system switches to fallback.

      • isAutoStack

        public boolean isAutoStack()
        Returns:
        a boolean value indicating whether automatic stacking is currently active.

      • isFallbackAllowed

        public boolean isFallbackAllowed()
        Returns:
        If fallback mode switching is allowed

      • isLights

        public boolean isLights()
        Returns:
        a boolean value indicating whether Lights(Pumps) are turned on.

      • isMonitor

        public boolean isMonitor()
        Returns:
        a boolean value indicating whether monitor transactions are currently permitted.

      • isReserveAuthAllowed

        public boolean isReserveAuthAllowed()
        Returns:
        a boolean value indicating that a Reserve must be done before an Authorise.

        This is used when a pump is reserved while a pre payment or pre authorisation is completed. If both IsSimpleAuthAllowed and IsReserveAuthAllowed are true then a Reserve is optional.

        Note : This replaces the original Prepay / Preauth settings.

      • isSimpleAuthAllowed

        public boolean isSimpleAuthAllowed()
        Returns:
        a boolean value indicating if an authorise is allowed without a previous Reserve.

        Note : This replaces the original post pay setting.

      • isStackingAllowed

        public boolean isStackingAllowed()
        Returns:
        a boolean value indicating whether transactions stacking is allowed.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        See Also:
        Object.toString()
